page.title: 15FARMING - GENERAL
page.content: The Goodman brothers farm 500 acres at Walsgrove and Old Yates Farms. The farm specializes in dairy farming, cereals and soft fruit. Crops are wheat-50 acres,winter barley-40 acres, spring barley-15 acres and fodder beet 15 acres. Crops are marketed through farmers' co-operative marketing groups and agricultural merchants. Additives to the land include fertilizers, pesticides, fungicides and lime where necessary.The farm has many machines used for a wide range of purposes. All the animals are home bred. There are dairy cows and heifers and cattle for beef. There are four workers who work from approx. 6.30a.m. to 6.30p.m. or later depending on the time of year. The farmer leads a busy life organizing and supervising his workmen inspecting stock and crops and dealing with callers,sales and office work.
